org.fcrepo.kernel.rdf.impl

Class DefaultGraphSubjects

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.kernel.rdf.impl.DefaultGraphSubjects
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphSubjects

    public class DefaultGraphSubjects
extends Object
implements GraphSubjects
    Translates JCR names into "fedora" subjects (by replacing jcr-specific names with fedora names)
    Author:
    barmintor
